channel.title: SEC Self-Regulatory Organization Rulemaking
channel.description: Filtered SEC SRO filings (excludes immediate effectiveness notices and crypto)

item.title: Self-Regulatory Organizations; MIAX Sapphire, LLC; Notice of Filing of Amendment No. 1 and Order Instituting Proceedings To Determine Whether To Approve or Disapprove a Proposed Rule Change, as Modified by Amendment No. 1, To Amend Exchange Rule 527
